# grctool

A Go CLI tool for SOC2/ISO27001 compliance automation integrating with Tugboat Logic.

## Project Structure
grctool/
├── cmd/                    # Thin CLI layer (Cobra commands)
├── internal/
│   ├── services/          # Business logic layer
│   │   ├── evidence/      # Evidence management
│   │   ├── validation/    # Data validation
│   │   └── config/        # Configuration management
│   ├── tools/             # Evidence collection tools
│   │   ├── terraform/     # Infrastructure analysis
│   │   ├── github/        # Source control analysis
│   │   └── types/         # Shared type definitions
│   ├── tugboat/           # Tugboat Logic API client
│   └── storage/           # File storage abstraction

## Key Concepts
- Evidence Tasks: Compliance requirements (ET-1 through ET-105)
- Controls: Security control implementations
- Policies: Organizational security policies
- Tools: Pluggable evidence collectors implementing Tool interface

## Development Guidelines
- Browser-based authentication (no API keys)
- YAML configuration with environment substitution
- Structured logging via internal/logger
- VCR for HTTP testing
